mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_project (project_id, design_id, student_id, create_time, file_address, file_name, enable_status) VALUES (#{projectID}, #{designID}, #{studentID}, #{createTime}, #{fileAddress}, #{fileName}, #{enableStatus})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_project WHERE project_id = #{projectID} AND design_id = #{designID} AND student_id = #{studentID}
